thread.section_title: River Palace Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Service and Great Location!
thread.title_full: Excellent Service and Great Location! - Review of River Palace Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Shavelle B
title: Excellent Service and Great Location!
text: We stayed at the River Palace Hotel for one night returning from a 7 day cruise. This hotel was everything that we expected and more. The staff were friendly and accomodating. This boutique hotel is quaint and charming. It is situated in such a great location. It is walking distance to historical sites, restaurants, and shopping. This hotel is a winner. Did I mentioned the great value of this hotel. We also recieved complimentary breakfast. I would highly recommend this hotel.
